titleNullable: Brazilian stock exchange shares for forecast
subtitleNullable: Data of several stocks with daily opening, variations and closing.
descriptionNullable:
💥This dataset contains **historical information about stocks** *(PETR4.SA, MGLU3.SA, ABEV3.SA, BBDC4.SA, ITUB4.SA, RAIZ4.SA, VALE3.SA)* traded on the **Brazilian stock exchange**. The dataset was collected from **Yahoo Finance** and has records **updated until 01/17/2023**.

It **includes variables such** as the opening price, high and low change, closing price, trading volume and stock name **for each stock**.

It can be used by **financial analysts, investors, and students to study and understand how stocks work** and **how stock prices** are **affected by different economic** and **political events**. This dataset can also be used to **train forecasting models** and **develop stock trading strategies**. 
 
>✨**Dataset Variables**:

> - **Date**: Day the share was traded
- **Open**: Open price of the share
- **High**: maximum variation in the day
- **Low**: Minimum variation in the day
- **Close**: Closing price of the stock
- **Volume**: Trading volume
- **Stock Name**: Traded stock name

👀The data was taken from the **Yahoo Finance** website: [https://br.financas.yahoo.com/](url)
